nodes.text: Gallie Wover was a female Gunnery Sergeant who served with the New Republic Defense Fleet. She was stationed aboard the cruiser Adamantine when the vessel transported Leia Organa Solo to Nam Chorios in 13 ABY, and later died of the Death Seed plague. Long before her time on the Adamantine, she had worked in merchant fleets for fifteen years after Palpatine had formed the Galactic Empire.
